sense.def: Pathological Condition of lou 瘺 , fistula, initially developing as severely itching swelling. Once they have opened to fester there appear numerous deep holes, and bugs/worms grow in these holes. In former times it was believed that this disease results from being affected by poisonous qi of dung beetles. Hence bugs reminiscent of dung beetles were seen to grow in the holes. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 34: 蜣螂瘺候：此由飲食居處 有蜣螂毒氣，入於臟腑，流於經脈所生也 , “The signs of dung beetle fistu la : This results from poisonous dung beetle qi one has encountered in beverages, food or at one’s living place, and that has entered one’s depots and palaces whence it has flown into the conduit vessels”.
